name: Cockeysville State Park
description: The park is open for operation on weekdays between 3:30 p.m. and sunset, and weekends between noon and sunset, from Spring to Fall.

name: Center for Maryland Agriculture and Farm Park
description: Baltimore County developed an agricultural resource center on this 149-acre property on the corner of Shawan and Cuba Roads.

name: Meadowood Regional Park
description: Located on the southwest corner of Falls and Greenspring Valley Roads just north of the Baltimore Beltway (I-695) and the Jones Falls Expressway (I-83), Meadowood Regional Park serves as a green gateway to scenic Greenspring Valley.

name: Merritt Point Park
description: Merritt Point Park, located on Bull Neck Creek, features one two-lane boat ramp.

name: Rocky Point Park
description: Rocky Point Park is located on the bay at the mouth of Back River.
